pros: Fits true to size; Good heel lock; Stable; A fair amount of cushioning; Value for money; Durable, grippy outsole; Guidance line keeps the foot steady
cons: Rubber outsole is squeaky; Not comfortable on longer runs; Inefficient arch support
RR_verdict: If you're looking for one of the best-value running shoes out there, the ASICS Gel Contend 7 is it. I love that this shoe provided ample cushioning for short to medium-length runs. The tough construction of the Gel Contend 7 also exceeded my expectations for its price bracket.
use: Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
